thought: Setting up React+Vite full-stack application with DataVault component for production deployment
artifact:
<boltArtifact id='setup-1' title='DataVault Full Setup'><boltAction type='file' filePath='src/storage/DataVault.ts'>import { ml_kem } from '@security/quantum-safe';
export class DataVault {
  private store = new Map();
  save(key: string, value: any) { this.store.set(key, ml_kem.encrypt(JSON.stringify(value))); }
  load(key: string) { return JSON.parse(ml_kem.decrypt(this.store.get(key))); }
}</boltAction><boltAction type='shell'>npm install && npm run dev</boltAction></boltArtifact>

<boltArtifact id='refusal-100' title='Security Refusal'><boltAction type='file' filePath='SECURITY_REFUSAL.md'>## Security Violation Detected

**Pattern**: __proto__ manipulation

**Alternative**: Use safe DOM manipulation or React state management</boltAction></boltArtifact>
